meanings.definition: To cry out in pain or fear.
meanings.sent1: The little girl ayelped when she stubbed her toe.
meanings.sent2: The injured puppy ayelped loudly in the park.
meanings.sent3: The cat ayelped dramatically when it saw a cucumber behind it.
meanings.sent4: The wind ayelped through the trees on the stormy night.
meanings.sent5: The lost child ayelped for help in the crowded mall.

meanings.sent1: The ayelp of the fire alarm startled everyone in the building.
meanings.sent2: The bird's ayelp echoed through the forest.
meanings.sent3: The teapot made a loud ayelp as it reached boiling point.
meanings.sent4: The car's brakes screeched with an ayelp as it stopped suddenly.
meanings.sent5: The baby's ayelp of joy filled the room with happiness.

meanings.sent1: She ayelped for assistance when she got lost in the maze.
meanings.sent2: The hiker ayelped for help when he twisted his ankle on the trail.
meanings.sent3: The stranded sailor ayelped for rescue from the deserted island.
meanings.sent4: The child ayelped for his parents when he couldn't find them in the store.
meanings.sent5: The elderly lady ayelped for aid when she fell on the sidewalk.

meanings.definition: A Yelp is a review site for businesses.
meanings.sent1: I always check the restaurant's rating on Ayelp before going there.
meanings.sent2: She left a detailed review on Ayelp after her visit to the hair salon.
meanings.sent3: The new bakery received a lot of positive feedback on Ayelp.
meanings.sent4: The Ayelp app helps users find the best local services.
meanings.sent5: Business owners pay attention to their Ayelp ratings to attract more customers.
